translation.en: -[male announcer] Are you ready? -[cheering]
I said, "Are you ready, Woodbright High?"
Give it up for the reigning champions of the Work It Dance Competition,
translation.ko: '워크 잇 댄스 대회'를 휘어잡으며 우승을 차지했던

translation.en: your very own Thunderbirds!
[girl] Albert Einstein once said that dancers are the athletes of God.
translation.ko: 알베르트 아인슈타인은 댄서가 신의 운동선수라고 했었다

translation.en: Kim Kardashian once said, "Lighting is everything."
And as head of the AV club, I had to agree.
translation.ko: 난 시청각 동아리 회장이니 이 말엔 전적으로 동의한다

translation.en: Sometimes I wonder,
translation.ko: 가끔 이런 의문이 든다 아인슈타인이 요새 사람이라면

translation.en: if Einstein were alive today, would he have even gotten into college?
translation.ko: 가끔 이런 의문이 든다 아인슈타인이 요새 사람이라면 대학에 합격할 수 있었을까?

translation.en: I mean, sure, he was good at math and science,
but did he have extracurriculars?
These days, great colleges want a little bit of everything,
translation.ko: 요즘 잘나가는 대학들은 골고루 잘하는 학생을 바란다

translation.en: and I thought I had it all on lock.
translation.ko: 난 내가 그런 학생인 줄 알았다

translation.en: I started my mornings with a TED Talk,
translation.ko: 아침엔 온라인 강연을 들으며 눈을 뜬다

translation.en: because who doesn't love a good life hack?
translation.ko: 누구나 인생의 지혜를 듣고 싶어 하는 법이니까

translation.en: [Female TED Talker] And that is why cold showers -are empirically more effec-- -[gasps]
translation.ko: 경험으로 미뤄 봤을 때 찬물로 샤워하는 게 효과적...

translation.en: [girl] I ride to school every day with my best friend, Jas.
Come on, hurry up! I have a bio test to fail.
translation.ko: 빨리 와, 망할 게 뻔한 생물 시험 봐야 한다고

translation.en: [girl] We've been inseparable since kindergarten, when she gave this kid a wedgie
translation.ko: 유치원 때 내 '빌 아저씨의 과학 이야기' 도시락통을 보고

translation.en: for making fun of my Bill Nye the Science Guy lunch box.
translation.ko: 어떤 녀석이 날 놀리자 얘가 똥침을 먹여줬다

translation.en: Jas isn't too worried about grades,
because she's gonna be a professional dancer.
[girl] While Jas was twerking up a storm,
I was building an impressive college résumé
translation.ko: 난 대학 입학용 지원서를 차곡차곡 채워가고 있었다

translation.en: with a well-calculated assortment of AP classes,
translation.ko: 엄선된 우등반 수업들과 학생회 같은 걸로 말이다

translation.en: student government, and I even volunteered at a local nursing home.
translation.ko: 엄선된 우등반 수업들과 학생회 같은 걸로 말이다 지역 양로원에서 봉사활동도 했다

translation.en: Anything to make my application fully rejection-proof.
translation.ko: 지원서를 완벽하게 만들 만한 건 다 했다고 보면 된다

translation.en: Okay, so I didn't have a boyfriend or a car or a bustling social calendar,
translation.ko: 난 남친도, 차도 요란한 사교 생활도 없었지만

translation.en: but it was all gonna pay off when I got into my dream school, Duke University.
translation.ko: 그만한 보상이 따를 거였다 내가 그토록 가고 싶어 하던 듀크대에 붙는다면

translation.en: I thought I had it all figured out,
translation.ko: 모든 게 술술 풀리는 것 같았다

translation.en: until one day, everything kind of spun out of control.
translation.ko: 내가 손 쓸 수 없는 일이 터지기 전까진

translation.en: Oh my…
That was a great show today, guys.
I thought it was one of our better ones, actually.
translation.ko: 그동안 했던 것보다 잘했던 것 같아

translation.en: There was, like, a couple kinks in there, but,
you know, we'll just work on all that moving forward.
Overall, I-I'm extremely happy.
Brit's hair was singed.
She's probably gonna have to get bangs now,
and she does not have the face for that.
-Look, Isaiah, I-- -[dancers gasp]
I mean, Juilliard.
I can assure you it was an accident.
You know, the Work It Competition is in five months,
translation.ko: 워크 잇 댄스 대회가 5개월밖에 안 남았어

translation.en: and it is my responsibility to lead our team to a fourth consecutive victory.
translation.ko: 이 대회에서 4연승 하는 게 내 책임이라고

translation.en: Do you understand?
You know, when people hear the name "Woodbright High," they think this.
translation.ko: '우드브라이트' 소리 들으면 사람들이 떠올리는 게 나랑...

translation.en: -The Thunderbirds. -It won't happen again.
Of course it won't, 'cause you're off the light board.
translation.ko: 당연하지 넌 이제 조명에서 손 뗄 거니까

translation.en: Brit, can you call Chris Chu?
translation.ko: - 브릿, 크리스 추 좀 불러줘 - 크리스 추?

translation.en: Chris Chu? You can't replace me with Chris Chu.
translation.ko: - 브릿, 크리스 추 좀 불러줘 - 크리스 추? 크리스 추라니 안 될 말이지 걔한테 조명 일 가르쳐준 게 난데

translation.en: I taught Chris Chu everything he knows.
translation.ko: 크리스 추라니 안 될 말이지 걔한테 조명 일 가르쳐준 게 난데

translation.en: -It's ringing. -Juilliard, please, you can't do this.
Look, I'm so sorry.
Honestly, Quinn, I don't accept your apology,
translation.ko: 퀸, 솔직히 말하면 네 사과 받아줄 생각 전혀 없어

translation.en: I'd like you to pack your things and clear out your locker.
You can't expel me. We're in the same French class.
translation.ko: 넌 나 못 내쫓아 같은 프랑스어 수업 듣잖아

translation.en: Baby, you're canceled.
-What? -You're deleted. You're unsubscribed.
Control, alt, delete.
I don't understand.
You are banished from this room. Do you understand that?
translation.ko: 넌 여기 없는 사람이라고 이제 알겠어?

translation.en: -[gasps] -[phone chimes, buzzes]
[Quinn] You're probably wondering, why Duke? Why not Yale or Penn
or Harvard?
Although, fun fact, Duke is the Harvard of the South.
[mom] Quinn, wake up! Today's the day! Duke interview!
[Quinn] My dad went there,
so I grew up going to football games and alumni events,
translation.ko: 어렸을 때부터 축구 경기와 동문 행사에 뻔질나게 갔거든

translation.en: and… I don't know, it just feels like home.
You know, if home had less than a six percent acceptance rate.
translation.ko: 합격률이 6%밖에 안 되는 고향이 있다면 말이지

translation.en: Strengths?
Intensity, intelligence, drive, compassion.
Weaknesses?
Single-mindedness… which, if you think about it, can be a strength.
translation.ko: 하나에 너무 집중하는 거 잘 생각해 보면 장점이 될 수도 있는 거죠

translation.en: This is just the first step. Pretty soon, you'll be premed,
translation.ko: 이건 시작에 불과해 조만간 넌 의대에 갈 거고 훌륭한 의사가 되겠지

translation.en: and then you'll be Dr. Quinn.
translation.ko: 조만간 넌 의대에 갈 거고 훌륭한 의사가 되겠지

translation.en: Okay, all right. I'm gonna focus now.
-[mom] Okay. -Okay.
[mom] I love ya.
Mom. Mom! What are you doing?
I'm putting you in the zone with my pump-up jam.
This is the jam I put on when I need to get pumped up.
translation.ko: 난 기운 내고 싶을 때 이 노래 듣거든

translation.en: Did you bring this
translation.ko: 이 순간에 들려주려고 챙겨 온 거예요?

translation.en: -just for this moment? -Bet your ass I did.
translation.ko: 이 순간에 들려주려고 챙겨 온 거예요? 당연한 걸 뭘 물어

translation.en: -That's nice. That's cool. -[mom] Mm-hm.
Fun. All right. All right, we're good.
Mom, people-- people can see us.
-People are watching. -'Cause they're jealous.
Now they're looking at me -because they're looking at you. -♪ Stand up and make it happen ♪
-Quinn. -Mom.
-[mom] 'Kay, I love you. Love you!
-[door shuts] -[mom] Even though you don't say it, I know you love me.
translation.ko: 대답은 안 했지만 너도 나 사랑하는 거 다 알아

translation.en: -[music fades] -I'm first in my class.
I am a National Merit scholar, 4.0 GPA.
translation.ko: 미국 고교 우수 장학생이죠 학점은 4.0 만점이에요

translation.en: I volunteer three afternoons a week at a local nursing home near my house.
I'm also student government treasurer.
-Did I mention head of the AV club? -I'm gonna stop you right there.
translation.ko: 시청각 동아리 회장이기도 하고요 일단 거기까지

translation.en: Student government. AV club. Volunteering.
-All applicants, nearly identical. -But do they also play the cello?
translation.ko: 지원자들이 다 거기서 거기야 하지만 걔네는... 첼로? 그럼! 다들 할 줄 알지만 좋아하진 않더라

translation.en: Yes, everybody plays the cello. And nobody likes playing the cello.
translation.ko: 첼로? 그럼! 다들 할 줄 알지만 좋아하진 않더라

translation.en: I love the cello.
Can you do for the cello what Lizzo does for the flute?
translation.ko: 리조가 플루트 연주하듯 첼로 연주할 수 있어?

translation.en: No.
What are you passionate about? What gets you out of bed in the morning?
translation.ko: 네 열정을 쏟는 분야가 어디야? 아침에 눈을 뜨게 만드는 일

translation.en: TED Talks.
Oh, girl, that's sad. Squirrel friend, are you for real?
Have you read a newspaper lately or even looked at the news?
translation.ko: 최근 신문이나 뉴스 한 번이라도 봤어?

translation.en: The world is burning.
I am looking for applicants that are change-makers, risk-takers.
translation.ko: 변화를 주도하고 위험을 감수하는 지원자를 찾는다고

translation.en: You know what I mean?
Not applicants that just, like, can fill the box.
translation.ko: 지원서나 빽빽하게 채우는 틀에 박힌 학생 말고

translation.en: I want an applicant to blow the box up.
Yeah.
Look, I am just trying to figure out who you are, who you really are.
translation.ko: 너라는 학생이 진짜로 어떤 사람인지 알고 싶어

translation.en: What's your passion? What are you passionate about?
Passion.
Duke.
That's sad, unless it's a guy named Duke that's really hot, okay?
translation.ko: - 듀크요 - 너무 슬프다 듀크란 남자가 진짜 섹시한 거 아니라면

translation.en: Because it's just a school.
It's just walls.
It's not passion.
You know what? This was very fun. Thank you so much for coming in.
translation.ko: 오늘 만나서 반가웠어 여기까지 와 줘서 고마워

translation.en: No, wait, please, Ms. Ramirez…
this is all I've ever wanted.
You see, my dad…
he went here, and he died when I was 12.
And my mom's had to work two jobs just to support us.
translation.ko: 그래서 엄마가 저 때문에 일을 두 탕이나 뛰어야 했고요

translation.en: What school do you go to?
-Woodbright High. -Woodbright High?
Oh, isn't that the school with the dance team?
With the birds or something that was on Ellen?
translation.ko: 엘런 디제너러스 쇼에 나온 무슨 버드 어쩌고...

translation.en: Yeah, they…
Yes… we were, after winning the Work It Dance Competition last year.
translation.ko: 우리가 작년 '워크 잇 댄스 대회' 우승을 차지하고 쇼에 나갔죠

translation.en: Well, this is just fascinating.
I had no idea you were part of the dance team.
I'm a-- I'm a contributor.
That's excellent. What's your style?
-I'm sorry? -Your style of dance, honey.
Are you a breaker?
Are you a wall climber?
Are you into Zumba? You just put on some neon shorts and just do a grapevine?
translation.ko: 줌바? 형광 바지 입고 옆으로 사뿐 뛰면서 춤추는 거야?

translation.en: What kind of dance do you do?
-I'm an i-illuminator. -Sorry?
An illuminator.
Ooh, illuminator. I've never heard of that before.
That must be really something. What do you do?
translation.ko: 뭔가 있어 보이는데 뭐 하는 거야?

translation.en: I just… I-I keep it lit, you know.
I definitely misread you, Ms. Ackerman.
I mean, dance team?
That takes emotion, power, grit. Here I thought you were all just, like,
translation.ko: 온갖 열정과 저력 노력을 쏟아부었겠구나 비슷한 성적에 자기소개서라 고만고만한 지원자인 줄 알았더니

translation.en: résumés and transcripts.
translation.ko: 비슷한 성적에 자기소개서라 고만고만한 지원자인 줄 알았더니

translation.en: You're the most exciting applicant I've seen this week.
translation.ko: 이번 주에 만난 지원자 중 가장 인상 깊은 학생이야

translation.en: I'm so happy. I will see you at the Work It Dance Competition,
translation.ko: 진짜 반갑다 '워크 잇 댄스 대회'에서 보자꾸나

translation.en: -okay? -You're going?
Hell yes! I wouldn't miss it.
translation.ko: 당연한 거 아냐? 내 눈으로 직접 확인해야지

translation.en: So, what did you talk about?
You were in there for such a long time, Quinn.
-Just school and stuff. -School and stuff? [gibbers]
translation.ko: 그냥 학교 얘기 같은 거 했죠 학교 얘기 같은 거라니 그게 다야? 더 얘기해 봐

translation.en: Come on! Give me more than that. [chuckles]
translation.ko: 학교 얘기 같은 거라니 그게 다야? 더 얘기해 봐

translation.en: Oh, did you tell her that you wanted to go premed?
-Mm-hm. -Yeah? Was she impressed?
-Yeah. -Yeah? 'Course she was.
I told you she'd be impressed.
Okay, what else? What else did you talk about?
She...
You know, I vaguely remember her saying, uh,
that I would make a great addition to the Duke family
translation.ko: 저보고 듀크대의 훌륭한 자산이 될 거라며

translation.en: and to keep up the good work.
Oh my God. You're a shoo-in. You're a shoo-in. I knew it!
translation.ko: 된 거네, 이럴 줄 알았어 진짜 자랑스럽다

translation.en: -I am so proud of you. -Oh, great. [grunting]
translation.ko: 된 거네, 이럴 줄 알았어 진짜 자랑스럽다 잘됐네요

translation.en: [Quinn] "Dear Ms. Ramirez,
Winston Churchill once said,
'The price for greatness is responsibility.'
So, I'm taking responsibility for my actions.
translation.ko: '그래서 저도 제가 한 일을 책임지려고 합니다'

translation.en: I wasn't entirely honest with you when I said I was a Thunderbird.
translation.ko: '선더버즈 얘기했을 때 말 못 한 부분이 있어요'

translation.en: Hey. Hey, can I talk to you for a minute?
Make it quick, honey.
Okay. So, I've been thinking about the routine for Work It, and…
translation.ko: 워크 잇 댄스 대회에서 댄서 배치하는 거 생각해 봤는데

translation.en: Well, I was hoping I could be featured.
There's gonna be a lot of recruiters there--
Everybody knows that the recruiters are coming
to see me lead the Thunderbirds to victory.
Okay.
Well, uh…
I actually think I'm just as good as you are.
-Oh, really? -Mmm… maybe better.
[Jas] Let's go then.
Sashay away, Jasmine. You won't ever be on my level.
translation.ko: 그만 물러가, 재스민 넌 내 발끝도 못 따라와

translation.en: Never.
[Quinn] So, I had to join the dance team. Me.
translation.ko: 어떻게든 댄스팀에 들어가야 했다 이렇게 비루한 내가...

translation.en: A girl who couldn't find her own heartbeat,
let alone a four-count.
When I was five, my mom enrolled me in a ballet class,
and I single-handedly ruined our recital.
But if there's one thing I am good at, it's studying.
translation.ko: 근데 또 내가 뭐 배우는 거엔 도가 텄잖아

translation.en: I just needed the right teacher.
-Hey! -Whoa! Jeez, you scared me. What?
I need to ask you something, and it's gonna sound absurd at first,
translation.ko: 부탁할 게 있어 이런 소리 하면 어이없겠지만

translation.en: -but I just need you to bear with me. -No no. Mm-mm.
translation.ko: - 나랑 같이 뭐 좀 하자 - 싫어

translation.en: I am not helping with your science project again,
translation.ko: 네 과학 숙제 돕는 건 사양이야

translation.en: -not after you electrocuted me last year. -It was a very low voltage.
translation.ko: - 감전당해서 골로 갈 뻔했잖아 - 전압 완전 낮았거든

translation.en: Dude, I couldn't feel my pinkie for a week!
Okay, I need you to help me get on the Thunderbirds.
translation.ko: 내가 선더버즈에 들어갈 수 있게 좀 도와줘

translation.en: You mean, like, back on the light board?
No, I mean, like, as a dancer.
[laughs] That's a good one.
Why aren't you laughing? Dude, you don't dance.
translation.ko: 뭘 그렇게 진지해? 너 춤 못 추잖아

translation.en: -[chuckles] I don't dance yet. -You don't dance at all.
translation.ko: - 안 춰본 거지 - 아예 안 추잖아

translation.en: Remember we had a conversation about flossing
translation.ko: 전에 플로싱 댄스 얘기했던 거 기억 안 나?

translation.en: and you thought I was talking about oral hygiene?
-We weren't talking about oral hygiene? -No, we weren't!
translation.ko: - 구강 위생 얘기했던 거 아니야? - 아니거든

translation.en: Look...
I really screwed up my Duke interview,
and I may have led the admissions lady to believe that I'm a Thunderbird.
translation.ko: 그래서 면접관한테 내가 선더버즈 멤버라고 했어

translation.en: [laughs] What? Why would-- Why would you do that?
I-I don't know! She-she kept saying that she wanted to shake things up,
translation.ko: 몰라, 자꾸 틀을 깨는 지원자를 찾는다잖아

translation.en: and it turns out that I'm a boring robot with no personal context,
translation.ko: 난 개성 따위 갖다 버리고 틀에 박힌 지루한 로봇이고

translation.en: and cellos are basic.
-And Duke doesn't want boring people. -Well, screw them, all right? Don't go.
translation.ko: 틀에 박힌 지원자는 가망 없어 됐다 그래, 안 가면 되지

translation.en: Jas, how are your grades?
Terrible. You know this.
Yes. So, what if New York Dance Academy wouldn't take you unless you had a 4.0?
translation.ko: 뉴욕 댄스 아카데미에서 4.0 이하는 못 온다고 하면?

translation.en: Probably cry a little bit, and then I'd crack them damn books.
translation.ko: 처음엔 좀 울다가 열라 열심히 공부하겠지

translation.en: Yeah, exactly, and I would help you.
But guess what? I have the exact opposite problem.
translation.ko: 근데 있지, 지금 딱 그 반대야

translation.en: I have a 4.0 GPA, and I need you to teach me how to dance.
translation.ko: 난 성적은 4.0이지만 네가 나한테 춤을 가르쳐줘야 해

translation.en: Quinn, auditions are in two weeks, and more importantly, Juilliard hates you.
translation.ko: 퀸, 오디션은 2주 후야 거기다 줄리아드는 널 싫어하고

translation.en: Look, if I'm undeniable, he has no choice but to take me.
Jas, please help me. I know you can do this.
translation.ko: 재스, 제발 도와줘 할 수 있잖아

translation.en: You should've seen my mom's face after the interview.
translation.ko: 면접 끝내고 나왔을 때 우리 엄마 표정을 봐야 했는데

translation.en: -How did she look at you? -It was sorta like…
I hate that. Stop that right now. That is terrifying.
translation.ko: 그거 너무 싫어 당장 관둬, 무섭잖아

translation.en: -Where are your eyeballs going? Stop. -Not till you say yes.
translation.ko: - 눈알 그렇게 굴리지 마 - 도와줄 때까지 이럴 거야

translation.en: Quinn, stop! Stop! Stop! Okay, fine!
-Fine, yes. -Yes?
Sorry, takes a second to get out of it. Okay.
translation.ko: 미안, 표정 바꾸는 데 시간 좀 걸리네

translation.en: Where were you? Were you in the Upside Down?
God, I'm good.
-Yes! -Yeah!
-[music ends] -[phone chimes, buzzes]
How many of you woke up this morning thinking,
"Today is the day that I become a Bird"?
translation.ko: 선더버즈에 입단할 거라고 생각한 사람이 몇이나 되려나?

translation.en: That was a question. Please raise your hands.
Well, I got some hard news for you.
We only have room in the crew for one of you.
The rest of you are going home.
Whoa. Ew, what are you doing here?
I banished you.
Trinity, can you sage the space?
translation.ko: 트리니티, 부정 안 타게 향 좀 피워 봐

translation.en: [whispers] Hi.
[normal voice] It's-- It's Quinn… Ackerman.
Yes?
You-- [coughs] You banished me from the lighting booth,
but I'm-I'm here to audition.
To dance? You?
[giggles] Yeah.
Well, Quinn Ackerman…
you're up first, honey.
Five, six, seven, eight.
Should I sage the space again?
translation.ko: 부정 안 타게 다시 향 좀 피울까?

translation.en: Okay.
Okay, I know I suck.
But-- But I tried.
I couldn't dance at all before, and that-- that wasn't my best--
translation.ko: 예전엔 춤 하나도 못 췄거든 이게 제일 잘한 것도 아니고...

translation.en: She can't dance at all now.
Please! You don't understand. I really need this.
translation.ko: 이해 못 할 거야 난 진짜 여기 들어가야 한다고

translation.en: -Jas-- -[Juilliard] Don't look at her.
-It's not her team. It's my team. -It wasn't that bad.
translation.ko: - 주장은 쟤가 아니라 나거든 - 그렇게 나쁘진 않았어

translation.en: [scoffs] Come on. You saw what I saw.
She's got talent. She just needs some nurturing.
translation.ko: 재능은 있어 그걸 좀 키워주면 되지

translation.en: Absolutely not.
Look, she really does need this.
Well then, she can start her own damn team for all I care.
Okay.
Fine.
I will start my own damn team then.
translation.ko: 그럼 내 팀 하나 만들지, 뭐

translation.en: [scoffs] Well, best of luck.
Everyone, where were we?
And my team will be all about building people up.
translation.ko: 우리 팀은 같이 발전하는 거에 중점을 둘 거야

translation.en: Oh. This is still happening?
And you know what?
Jas is gonna be my captain.
translation.ko: 재스가 우리 팀 주장이 될 거야

translation.en: There it is.
Say what?
-[Quinn] Jas? -[Jas] No.
-Jas! -I'm not gonna--
Quinn, what are you doing?
How much fun did we have dancing together these past two weeks?
translation.ko: 지난 2주 동안 나랑 춤추면서 완전 즐거웠잖아

translation.en: You don't want to dance for him.
Okay, now you're starting to piss me off. She isn't going with you.
translation.ko: 이쯤 되니 슬슬 짜증 나려 하거든 쟤는 너랑 안 가 여기 있을 거라고

translation.en: She's staying here.
translation.ko: 쟤는 너랑 안 가 여기 있을 거라고

translation.en: What side of history do you want to be on?
We have no dancers.
We will find dancers.
I promise you we can do this.
There's never been another dance team at this school.
translation.ko: 이 학교에 다른 댄스팀은 한 번도 없었어

translation.en: We can't lose Jas.
She's fire.
No, she's not. She's completely overrated.
Jas doesn't know one thing about fire.
Quinn, you better be serious about this.
translation.ko: 퀸, 할 거면 제대로 하는 게 좋을 거야

translation.en: [whispers] My God.
That was the coolest thing I've ever done.
Oh my God. I can't believe that just happened.
translation.ko: 미치겠네, 이런 일이 생기다니 믿기지 않아

translation.en: Honestly, neither can I.
No, no, no, no. I'm going back in there.
No, you can't. You lost his trust. You can't go back now.
translation.ko: 아니, 줄리아드랑은 끝났어 이제 강을 건넜지

translation.en: Dude, this may be the dumbest thing I've ever done.
translation.ko: 평생 내가 한 일 중 가장 미친 짓인 것 같아

translation.en: No, what about the sexting incident with that guy Eugene?
Okay, the second dumbest thing I've ever done.
-Why do I feel so nauseous? -Hey, calm down! It's gonna be okay.
translation.ko: - 왜 이렇게 불안하지? - 진정해, 괜찮을 거야

translation.en: No, Quinn, I don't think you understand.
A recruiter from the New York Dance Academy
is going to be at Work It,
translation.ko: 워크 잇 댄스 대회에 올 거야

translation.en: which means I need to be there on that stage, killing it.
translation.ko: 내가 무대 위에서 끝내줘야 한다는 얘기지

translation.en: You will be. I promise.
Okay, can I get that in writing, please?
Listen, you just need to sit back,
translation.ko: 잘 들어 넌 그냥 편하게 쉬고 있어

translation.en: relax, and let me do what I do best.
translation.ko: 잘 들어 넌 그냥 편하게 쉬고 있어 내 특기 발휘할 테니까

translation.en: -Which is what? Stress me out? -No.
Research and organization.
Okay, yeah, both of those words stress me out.
I've gathered up the ingredients we need to make an award-winning dance team.
translation.ko: 수상 가능한 댄스팀 구성에 필요한 요소를 찾아봤어

translation.en: We need an incredible DJ for music,
we need a flipper, someone with really great power moves,
translation.ko: 플리퍼 댄서도 있어야 하고 절도 있게 움직이는 댄서

translation.en: and most importantly, we need an amazing choreographer.
translation.ko: 그리고 제일 중요한 건 실력 있는 안무가지

translation.en: So, I've been looking at the previous competition winners,
and it's this guy, Jake Taylor.
He captained the winning team three years in a row.
Maybe we could get him to choreograph for us.
Yeah, Quinn, everybody knows Jake Taylor, all right?
translation.ko: 퀸, 이 바닥에서 제이크 테일러 모르는 사람 없어

translation.en: He was the best dancer in the state until he tore his ACL.
translation.ko: 전방십자인대가 찢어지기 전까지 이 지역 최고 댄서였지

translation.en: No one has seen or heard from him in, like, two years.
translation.ko: 근데 2년간 아무 소식도 없어 자취를 싹 감췄다고

translation.en: We'd have a better chance at building a time machine
and kidnapping a young Channing Tatum.
translation.ko: 어린 채닝 테이텀 납치하는 게 더 쉬울걸

translation.en: -I found him. -[Jas] What? How?
I checked his old Instagram,
checked all his geo-tags, and from there, it was just a simple mapping.
translation.ko: 제이크가 다녔던 곳을 다 추적했지 간단한 기술이야

translation.en: Well, damn, Nancy Drew.
And now all we have to do is convince him.
translation.ko: 이제 이 사람 설득만 하면 돼

translation.en: Convince this hot stranger you stalked to coach your non-existent dance team.
translation.ko: 있지도 않은 댄스팀 안무 해달라고 섹시남 스토킹해서 설득한다고?

translation.en: Yeah, pretty much.
I'm sure Jake Taylor is onto much bigger and better things.
translation.ko: 제이크 테일러라면 훨씬 거하고 좋은 일 하겠지

translation.en: -[boy] What was your favorite dance move? -[girl] Um, probably the one where…
[boy] Yeah.
Are you-- Are you Jake Taylor?
Depends on who's asking.
Right. Um, I-I'm Quinn…
Ackerman.
And I'm starting a dance team at Woodbright High.
-I'm not interested. -So I just--
We would like you to be our choreographer for the following reasons.
translation.ko: 다음과 같은 이유로 널 안무가로 섭외하고 싶어

translation.en: One. According to my research of every dance movie ever made,
translation.ko: 먼저 지금까지의 모든 춤 영화를 조사해 봤는데

translation.en: we have a very important ingredient for winning: a can-do spirit.
translation.ko: 우승을 하려면 중요한 게 몇 개 있어, '할 수 있다' 정신

translation.en: [chuckles] That's uh… not how dance works.
Well, that's why we would need you.
No, I'm good.
Okay. Number two.
Um, this is your chance to overcome your demons,
due to your… knee injury.
Don't come back here.
Okay, fine. We'll just win the Work It Dance Competition without you, then.
translation.ko: 그럼 워크 잇 댄스 대회는 너 없이 우승해 보지, 뭐

translation.en: And you won't go insane, you know,
being slowly eaten up by all that unrealized potential.
Wait. Hold up.
-Can-do spirit. -Mm-hm.
What about skill?
-We're extremely skilled. -[laughs] I can spot a fake anywhere.
translation.ko: 실력이야 말해 뭐해? 난 거짓말하면 다 알아

translation.en: Then you must know that I'm the real deal.
translation.ko: 그럼 내가 진짜 댄서인 건 한눈에 알아봤겠네

translation.en: You dance? How long?
-Since I was ten. -Influences?
Paul Taylor, Ashley Everett,
-Travis Wall-- -Look at you.
The way you carry yourself, your posture. You're…100% not a dancer.
translation.ko: 너 걸어 다니는 거랑 자세 보면 댄서는 확실히 아니거든

translation.en: I still have time to learn.
Why would you enter a competition
translation.ko: 춤도 못 추면서 대회는 왜 나가려는 거야?

translation.en: -when you don't know how to dance? -Fair question.
translation.ko: 춤도 못 추면서 대회는 왜 나가려는 거야? 좋은 질문이네, 듀크대 면접관한테 거짓말을 해서

translation.en: So I may have lied to the Duke college admissions officer,
translation.ko: 좋은 질문이네, 듀크대 면접관한테 거짓말을 해서

translation.en: which means now I have to put my money where my mouth is.
translation.ko: 그 말에 책임져야 하는 사태가 생겼어

translation.en: Give up.
Go to community college. I-I can't help you.
translation.ko: 그냥 전문대 가 난 도와줄 수 없다고

translation.en: I don't give up.
[Quinn] Check it out. I made flyers.
translation.ko: 전단지 만들었어 "새 댄스팀 첫 미팅 공짜 과자 제공"

translation.en: Okay. So, hey, the Thunderbirds have the best dancers at the school, right?
translation.ko: 학교 최고의 춤꾼들은 다 선더버즈에 있는 거 알지?

translation.en: At least the ones who auditioned.
-So we need to find-- -The diamonds in the rough.
translation.ko: - 그러니 우리가 찾을 건... - 흙 속의 진주

translation.en: I was gonna say, "The ones who don't audition."
translation.ko: 오디션 안 본 사람이라고 말하려 했는데

translation.en: But yeah, okay.
So there's this girl in my homeroom, all right?
She makes these dance videos
and posts them on Instagram. Check it out.
Um… I don't know, Jas. She seems… intense.
translation.ko: "모든 게 불쾌해" 글쎄, 좀 세 보이는데

translation.en: -She can dance. -["When I Get Going" by KALLICO playing]
[goth girl] I don't believe in teams.
translation.ko: 난 팀 활동 같은 거 안 해

translation.en: Did you know that Friedrich Nietzsche was the starting number ten
translation.ko: 프리드리히 니체가 18살 때 독일 축구 국가 대표팀에서

translation.en: for the German national football team when he was 18 years old?
translation.ko: 선발 10번으로 뛰었던 거 알아? "자라투스트라는 이렇게 말했다 프리드리히 니체"

translation.en: Yeah, apparently that experience influenced a lot of his later work.
translation.ko: 그런 경험이 후기작에 영향을 많이 미친 것 같더라

translation.en: -♪ La la la, oh-oh ♪ -I don't really know what's going on here, -but take this. -♪ La la la, oh-oh ♪
translation.ko: 무슨 말인지 하나도 모르겠지만 이거 받아

translation.en: Hm-mm. I see you. You got some moves.
translation.ko: 내가 보면 알아, 너 재능 있어

translation.en: That's my victory dance.
Okay, see, I didn't wanna be the one to tell you this, but you suck at soccer.
translation.ko: 이런 말 하긴 싫었는데 너 축구엔 재능 없어

translation.en: -No, I don't. -Yeah, you do.
Yeah, well, you see, I ran the numbers,
translation.ko: 내가 확률 계산을 좀 해 봤는데

translation.en: and the odds of the team actually playing you this season
translation.ko: 네가 이번 시즌에 그 팀에서 선발로 뛸 확률은

translation.en: are ten to one, so…
Great practice, man!
-Ouch. -Woof. Yeah, that was painful to watch.
translation.ko: - 아야 - 멍멍 보기 힘들 정도로 짠했어

translation.en: So you should be on a team that really respects your talent.
translation.ko: 네 재능을 소중히 여기는 팀에서 뛰어야지

translation.en: And first, you should start by doing something you're really good at.
translation.ko: 먼저 네가 잘하는 것부터 시작해야 하고

translation.en: ♪ When I get goin'… ♪
[Jas] Everybody calls this kid DJ Tapes
translation.ko: 다들 이 녀석을 DJ 테이프라고 불러

translation.en: because he makes the hottest mix tapes around.
translation.ko: 동네에서 제일 핫한 믹스 테이프를 만들거든

translation.en: But what they don't know is that he's got some serious moves.
translation.ko: 근데 이 친구가 엄청난 춤꾼인 건 아무도 몰라

translation.en: Yeah, this guy is supposed to be the best flipper in town.
translation.ko: 저 친구가 이 동네 최고의 플리퍼 댄서지

translation.en: [Quinn] He's, like, 50.
[Jas] No, not him. The one that looks like Conan O'Brien.
translation.ko: 저 사람 말고 저기 코넌 오브라이언 닮은 애

translation.en: The guy can flip.
-It's not true. -[Jas] Mm… that's not what I heard.
translation.ko: 전혀 아니야 내가 들은 거랑 다른데

translation.en: I did one flip one time in eighth grade at Ryan Goodman's pool party.
translation.ko: 8학년 때 한 번 춰본 게 다야 라이언 수영장 파티에서

translation.en: -I heard it was perfect. -I don't even remember how I did it.
translation.ko: - 그게 그렇게 완벽했다던데 - 어떻게 했는지도 기억 안 나

translation.en: Right, but you did it once, which means you can do it again.
translation.ko: 그럴 수 있지, 근데 한 번 했다면 또 할 수 있을 거야

translation.en: It's still somewhere inside of you. We just have to find it.
translation.ko: 본인 안에 답이 있어 그걸 찾기만 하면 되지

translation.en: You will flip again.
Catch you on the flip side.
[Quinn] Priya and I once did a presentation for physics class.
translation.ko: 프리야랑 난 물리 수업에서 발표 같이한 적 있어

translation.en: She skated in circles while I talked about the theory of centrifugal force.
translation.ko: 내가 원심력 이론 설명할 때 프리야가 계속 빙글빙글 돌았지

translation.en: Needless to say, we aced it,
so she totally owes me.
Two, two, three, four, five, six.
translation.ko: 둘, 둘, 셋, 넷, 다섯, 여섯

translation.en: -What are you doing here? -I signed up online.
You realize this is a kids' class, right?
Yeah, well, there was no age limit on the website, so…
Great. You do you.
[Jake] All right, here we go! Six, seven, eight.
One, two, three. [grunting]
We found some great new dancers to join our team.
translation.ko: 우리 팀에 들어올 훌륭한 댄서들은 찾았어

translation.en: We'd still love to have you choreograph.
-What do you think? -I think you still can't dance.
All right. I didn't want to have to…
show you everything at once, but…
translation.ko: 한 번에 다 보여줄 순 없지만...

translation.en: let's go for it, all right.
Please don't do that.
All right. Well, I still have the animations.
translation.ko: - 제발 그건 하지 마 - 알겠어 로봇 댄스도 출 줄 알지롱

translation.en: No? Okay. Well, what about this one?
Step… [softly] drop, step…
Uh-huh, you love it. You kinda like it.
-No? -Ju--
[Quinn softly] I'm stepping…
-then I drop. -Come here.
Stand right there.
Look right here. [chuckles] Okay. Just-- Just follow me.
translation.ko: 여기를 봐, 좋아 그냥 나 따라 하면 돼

translation.en: Okay? We're gonna step to the right.
Seven, eight.
Step, drop. Step, drop.
Step, drop-- Make it two movements. Step, then drop.
translation.ko: 밟고 내리고, 이어서 해 봐 먼저 밟고 내리는 거야

translation.en: Kind of.
Just keep doing it.
All right, slow it down. Slow it down.
Do you mind?
Take it from the top.
-[emotional music plays] -Seven, eight.
Step, drop. Nice.
Step, drop. You feel that?
Step, drop. That's good.
Step, drop. More power in your arms. Really bring it to you.
translation.ko: 밟고 내리고, 잘하네 밟고 내리고 팔에 힘 더 줘 너한테 끌어오는 거야

translation.en: Step, drop. Step, drop.
Step, drop. That's good. Step, drop.
Bring it to you, from out to your shoul-- There we go!
Nice. Step, drop.
Step, drop. We're gonna ball change, all right?
translation.ko: 좋아, 밟고 내리고 밟고 내리고 볼체인지 할 거야

translation.en: Drop, ball change.
[chuckles] Okay. Step, drop.
That's good. Step, drop. Back the other way. Step, drop.
translation.ko: 잘했어, 밟고 내리고 다시 반대쪽으로 밟고 내리고 밟...

translation.en: Shit!
-Are you okay? -[grunts]
I'm fine. I'm fine. I'm fine.
May I?
[Quinn] I read about acupressure for your knee injury,
and these points were recommended.
Thanks.
Thank you… for the dance lesson.
Yeah, good. Your foot is comfortable,
and your seat belt is on. Did you check your mirror?
-What do you see? -Uh… a tree?
Good job. Slow down.
[sighs] So I took on a new extracurricular.
Oh, yeah? What is it?
-Dance team. -Dance team?
That sounds fun. It also sounds very time-consuming.
translation.ko: 재미있겠네 시간 투자도 많이 해야 할 것 같고

translation.en: Well, Einstein said, "Time is an illusion."
Well, Einstein also said, "Worry about your GPA."
-That's a good one. -Okay, slow down.
Yeah, keep it slow. Good job.
So, um, you think I'm ready to leave the parking lot yet?
translation.ko: 이제 주차장 좀 벗어나도 될 것 같아요?

translation.en: [mom] Definitely not. At least another week.
translation.ko: 절대 안 되지 일주일은 더 연습해야 해

translation.en: -[Quinn] You said that last week. -Okay.
You are so lucky you missed. Do it again, though. I dare you.
translation.ko: 빗나가서 운 좋은 줄 알아 다시 해 봐, 어디 한번 해보라고

translation.en: Eat me.
Kids are disgusting.
Okay, everybody.
You have each been chosen
to be part of a brand-new dance crew.
Name TBD.
What is TBD?
It stands for "to be determined."
translation.ko: '나중에 정할 예정' 줄임말 진짜 이름은 아니고 그냥...

translation.en: -That's not our real name. It's just-- -The flyer said there would be snacks.
translation.ko: '나중에 정할 예정' 줄임말 진짜 이름은 아니고 그냥... 공짜 과자 준다며

translation.en: Which are also TBD as of right now.
Okay. Tapes?
-You're doing our music. -Dope.

translation.ko: 좋아, 가자 난 여기 잠깐만 있다 갈게 이상하네

translation.en: [Quinn] "Dear Ms. Ramirez, thank you for the update on my application.
I have a confession to make. I am not a Thunderbird.
I have started my own dance team,
led by award-winning choreographer Jake Taylor.
translation.ko: '대회 연승 경력의 안무가 제이크 테일러가 이끄는 팀이죠'

translation.en: We'll be performing at the Work It Dance Competition in a few weeks.
translation.ko: '몇 주 있다가 워크 잇 댄스 대회에 나갈 거예요'

translation.en: See you there, and hopefully again in the fall at Duke.
-Sincerely, Quinn Ackerman." -[laptop swooshes]
-Good morning. -Good morning.
Is it just me or have you grown, like, two inches in the last two weeks?
translation.ko: 2주 동안 5cm는 큰 것 같은데 내 착각이니, 진짜 그런 거니?

translation.en: I think it's just posture, Mom.
So, I was thinking, who do we know that went to Duke that could help us?
translation.ko: 듀크대 동문 중에 도움 될 만한 사람 혹시 아니?

translation.en: I don't need anyone's help.
I just don't understand why they're taking so long.
Didn't she say you were like a shoo-in?
No, you said I was a shoo-in.
She said I would make an excellent addition.
translation.ko: 면접관님은 내가 학교의 훌륭한 자산이 될 거라고 했죠

translation.en: Either way, they should not lead you on like that.
translation.ko: 어쨌든 사람을 그렇게 헷갈리게 하면 안 되지

translation.en: -I've got it covered. Don't worry. -Why are you so chill about this?
translation.ko: - 알아서 할 테니 걱정하지 마세요 - 어떻게 그렇게 차분해?

translation.en: I just realized I have to go. I'll see you later.
Bye. Oh, you know what?
My gynecologist is a Dukie.
Jake Taylor?
It's definitely him.
So hot.
Great.
So Jas is dancing to Jake Taylor's choreography.
translation.ko: 재스가 제이크 테일러 안무로 춤춘다는 거지

translation.en: God, this is exactly what I needed today.
translation.ko: 오늘 같은 날 딱 듣고 싶었던 말이네

translation.en: [Brit] What happened with your Juilliard audition?
Oh, I don't know, Britney. Why don't you mind your damn business?
translation.ko: 모르지, 브리트니 네 일이나 신경 쓰지 그래?

translation.en: Sorry, it's just that they said conservatory dancing is different,
translation.ko: 미안, 줄리아드 면접관이 고전 댄스는 좀 다르다면서

translation.en: and if I want to be taken seriously,
I would need to learn to control my fire.
[Brit] Oh, it's okay.
Wait. What? Don't be sorry for me. Be sorry for them.
Yeah, I would die before I extinguish my flames for some stuffy-ass school.
translation.ko: 그런 꽉 막힌 학교에 가면 춤도 다 추기도 전에 죽을걸

translation.en: You don't want this? You don't want that?
You don't want this fire? Your loss.
Their loss.
translation.ko: - 완전 손해지 - 줄리아드 안 간 사람 많아

translation.en: You know who else didn't go to Juilliard? Cardi B.
translation.ko: - 완전 손해지 - 줄리아드 안 간 사람 많아 카디 B

translation.en: Bruno Mars, Jamiroquai, Janelle Monáe, Janet Jackson, Oprah, Obama.
translation.ko: 브루노 마스, 자미로콰이, 오바마 저넬 모네이, 재닛 잭슨, 오프라

translation.en: Lots of people.
So I'm fine.
Do we still call him Juilliard?
[woman] Quinn, you can do better than this.
[Jas] Dude!
Robby can flip!
-[mouths word] -[Jas] He flipped!
Robby! Whoo! [laughing] [Jas] Come on! Come on!
[Juilliard] All right. Now that we've saged the space,
translation.ko: 좋아, 이제 여기 향 좀 피우고

translation.en: let's try to adjust this terrible lighting.
Brit, Trinity, can you help me find the switches, please?
translation.ko: 브릿, 트리니티 스위치 좀 찾게 도와줘

translation.en: Where's Jake?
What are you doing here?
-We booked the studio. -[Quinn] What?
You know you have to actually pay to use a dance studio, right?
translation.ko: 연습실 쓰려면 돈 내야 하는 거 알지?

translation.en: Otherwise, people get fired.
Jake!
Are you kidding me?
-Jake, everything's gonna be okay. -How?
translation.ko: - 제이크, 다 잘 풀릴 거야 - 어떻게?

translation.en: How is it gonna be okay?
Quinn, I just got fired.
I need this job. How am I gonna pay my rent?
translation.ko: 난 저 일이 필요했다고 이제 월세는 무슨 돈으로 내?

translation.en: Shit.
Is that how you want to play this, you little psychopath?
translation.ko: 이런 식으로 나올 거야? 사이코패스 같으니라고

translation.en: [chuckles] Your outburst is really eating into our rehearsal time, sweetie.
translation.ko: 네가 우리 연습 시간 잡아먹고 있는 건 알지?

translation.en: You seriously felt so threatened by us that you had to sabotage our team?
I didn't do anything. You do that all on your own.
translation.ko: 난 아무 짓도 안 했어 다 너희가 자초한 거지

translation.en: See, I still remember when we were freshmen,
and you didn't make the Birds.
But you begged,
and you did the seniors' homework and washed their cars.
translation.ko: 선배들 숙제해 주고 세차해 주면서 말이야

translation.en: Flank me. Flank me, flank me.
You know, a lot's changed, Jas. Now everyone washes my car.
translation.ko: 많은 게 변했어, 재스 이제 다들 내 차를 세차하지

translation.en: It's so clean, you could eat sushi off it. I did it once.
translation.ko: - 초밥 접시로 쓸 수 있을 정도야 - 나도 한 번 닦았어

translation.en: Well, enjoy your poke off your Prius while you can.
translation.ko: 즐길 수 있을 때 실컷 즐겨둬

translation.en: This is not over.
And you look like a tampon commercial.
translation.ko: 그리고 너 탐폰 광고하는 사람 같아

translation.en: Let's go.
[Jas] Oh, ho, it's on now. -Oh, we're taking him down. -[Tapes] Oh, yeah, yeah, yeah.
translation.ko: 전쟁 시작이야 저놈 반드시 밟아주고 말겠어

translation.en: Hey. Where's Jake?
[Quinn] Over the next few days, I reached out to Jake a bunch of times,
translation.ko: 며칠 동안 제이크한테 여러 번 연락했다

translation.en: and I waited for him to text me back, but he never did.
Meanwhile, all the time I had put into the dance team had wrecked my GPA.
translation.ko: 댄스팀에 쏟아부은 시간 덕에 성적은 엉망이 됐다

translation.en: And that's when I got the e-mail.
"As of January 22nd, I will no longer be working
in the Duke University admissions department.
If this is in regards to an application, please contact our office directly."
translation.ko: '지원서 관련 일이라면 사무실에 직접 연락하시길 바랍니다'

translation.en: What?
[repeating] No.
[Ms. Ramirez] -Hello? -Thank God. Hi!
Ms. Ramirez, it is-- It's Quinn Ackerman from Woodbright High.
translation.ko: 라미레스 씨, 퀸 애커먼이에요 우드브라이트 학생요

translation.en: Uh, you probably don't remember me. I'm the dancer.
translation.ko: 기억 못 하시겠지만 그때 그 댄서 있잖아요

translation.en: Oh yeah, the illuminator. How ya doin'? You keeping it lit?
translation.ko: 그래, 일루미네이터 여전히 팀을 빛내고 있어?

translation.en: Yeah. Um, so, I saw the e-mail that you sent.
What's that about? What's happening over there?
translation.ko: 그건 뭐죠? 어쩌다 그렇게 된 거예요?

translation.en: Yeah. I'll tell you what's happening here… Nothing.
translation.ko: 무슨 일인지 말해줄게 아무 일도 없었어

translation.en: [Quinn] What happened to… shaking things up?
translation.ko: 틀을 깨는 지원자는 어떻게 되는 거죠?

translation.en: Yeah. You know what? They really weren't into that.
translation.ko: 그거 있잖아 학교 측에서 관심이 없더라

translation.en: What can I say? I tried.
[Quinn] You tried?
I learned how to dance.
[Ms. Ramirez] I'm sorry. Wait. What did you say?
I started a dance team for you.
translation.ko: 라미레스 씨 얘기 때문에 댄스팀 만들었다고요

translation.en: Good for you, girl. You blew up the box.
No, I blew up my life.
You didn't blow up your life. You blew up your box.
translation.ko: 네 인생이 아니라 틀을 깬 거야

translation.en: What does that mean?
-[guard clears throat] -I gotta go.
-It's turning into a whole thing. -No, you don't have to--
translation.ko: 가야겠다, 상황이 복잡해지고 있어 아니요, 그러지 말고...

translation.en: Hello?
No.
Shit! Shit!
[mom] A half-day suspension? What if Duke finds out?
translation.ko: 반나절 정학? 듀크 측에서 알게 되면 어쩌려고?

translation.en: I know. I had a bad day, and the dance team--
Ever since you started dancing, you have been completely off-balance.
translation.ko: 너 댄스팀에 들어간 이후로 정신 못 차리고 있는 거 같아

translation.en: Your grades have been dropping. You're home late. I...
translation.ko: 성적도 떨어지고 집에도 맨날 늦게 오잖아

translation.en: I don't understand why you felt the need to have this whole other hobby
translation.ko: 이해가 안 된다 왜 지금까지 했던 거랑

translation.en: that has nothing to do
with what we've been working towards this whole time.
Mom, I lied to you.
-What? -I lied because the Duke interview was not going as well as I said it was,
translation.ko: 듀크 면접 말이에요 그렇게 잘 풀리지 않았어요

translation.en: and the admissions lady brought up the Thunderbirds,
so I made her think I was on the team…
-What are you talking about? -…though I only do lighting.
So then Jas and I decided to make our own team…
translation.ko: 그래서 재스랑 둘이 댄스팀을 만들기로 했죠

translation.en: -Stop. -…then today I found out
translation.ko: - 그만 - 근데 오늘 그 면접관이 입학처에서 퇴사한 걸 알게 된 거예요

translation.en: the admissions lady doesn't work there anymore.
translation.ko: 그 면접관이 입학처에서 퇴사한 걸 알게 된 거예요

translation.en: I don't understand. So is it over? Is it done?
translation.ko: 무슨 소리야 그럼 다 끝난 거야?

translation.en: I still have another month to resubmit my grades,
translation.ko: 한 달 후에 성적표 다시 내면 돼요

translation.en: but they've gotten…
pretty bad, and the suspension is…
not good.
I'm really sorry, Mom.
Oh, man.
Okay.
It's okay.
We're gonna figure this out.
You're gonna buckle down and focus on your school work,
translation.ko: 일단 닥치는 대로 열심히 하고 학교 공부에 집중해

translation.en: and you're gonna pull those grades up.
You know what this means, though?
So you're just gonna quit on us? Just like that?
I really need to get my grades up.
Plus, I'm the worst dancer on the team. You guys don't really need me. And…
translation.ko: 거기다 내가 팀 꼴찌니 딱히 내가 필요하진 않잖아

translation.en: I'm holding you guys back. I'm the weak link.
translation.ko: 내가 너희 발목 잡는 꼴이 될 거야

translation.en: Yeah. And we stuck by you.
translation.ko: 그래, 발목 잡아서 꼼짝할 수가 없게 됐지

translation.en: Jas…
I did all of this for you, Quinn.
translation.ko: 이 모든 거 다 널 위해서 한 거야

translation.en: I quit the Birds for you. You begged me to.
And what? Just 'cause your mom says you have to, you're gonna bail on us?
translation.ko: 근데 엄마가 그러라고 하니까 쏠랑 우릴 버리는 거야?

translation.en: I'm really sorry.
Wow.
For a second, I thought you cared, and you weren't just using all of us.
translation.ko: 우릴 이용하는 게 아니라 진짜 신경 쓰는 줄 알았더니

translation.en: I do care. I still care.
translation.ko: 정말 신경 많이 써, 지금도 그렇고

translation.en: You know, I really hope you get into Duke, Quinn.
And I hope it was worth losing your only friend over.
translation.ko: 유일한 친구를 잃을 정도로 가치 있는 일이면 좋겠네

translation.en: Ja-- Jas?
Jas? Jas!
Guys, wh--[exhales]
You don't hate me?
No, I do. I just need to update my Instagram story.
translation.ko: 싫어, 근데 인스타그램 스토리에 이거 올리려고

translation.en: Are you filming me right now?
You've been filming this whole time?
Stop that.
That's it. It's over.
Priya Singh, signing off.
Quinn, I saw Priya's Instagram. You can't quit.
translation.ko: 프리야 인스타그램 봤어 그만두면 안 되지

translation.en: You can't ghost me and then tell me what to do.
translation.ko: 완전 모른 척하더니 이제 와서 명령질이네

translation.en: You're right. I was upset, and that's no excuse,
translation.ko: 맞아, 그땐 많이 속상했어 변명은 소용없겠지만

translation.en: but you have to listen. Don't walk away from this.
translation.ko: 그래도 내 말 들어, 관두면 안 돼

translation.en: They'll be better off without me, okay?
Everyone is counting on you. You can't bail on them.
translation.ko: 퀸, 다들 널 의지하고 있어 그렇게 등지면 안 되지

translation.en: You're lecturing me about quitting?
Look... I made a promise to my mom.
I don't have time for dance anymore.
And I-- I really don't have time for a boyfriend.
-[music ends] -[TV] Still waiting?
This show's garbage. I like Queer Eye. I love Queer Eye.
translation.ko: 이 프로그램 쓰레기 같네 난 '퀴어 아이'가 좋아 진짜 재밌지

translation.en: It makes me cry every time. I wish they'd come here.
translation.ko: 볼 때마다 운다니까 여기도 한 번 오면 좋겠는데

translation.en: Give me a makeover.
So what's all that, honey?
Um… it's just chemistry, biology.
You shouldn't be spending Friday night in this funeral home reading textbooks.
translation.ko: 금요일 저녁에 장례식장 같은 데서 교과서나 읽고 있다니

translation.en: You should be out with your friends, getting into trouble.
translation.ko: 친구들이랑 신나게 놀면서 문제에 휘말리고 그래야지

translation.en: Yeah, well, I've got plenty of trouble and no friends.
And the only chance I have now at getting into a decent college is…
translation.ko: 그리고 좋은 대학교 가려면 교과서나 읽는 수밖에 없어요

translation.en: by reading these textbooks.
Look at me. You see that guy over there?
translation.ko: 나 좀 봐, 저 남자 보여?

translation.en: Max Berman. Harvard Law School.
-Argued two cases to the Supreme Court. -Wow.
And Penny Kitz ran the cardiology department at UNC.
translation.ko: 페니 키츠, 노스캐롤라이나 대학 병원 심장학과 과장이었지

translation.en: And look at them now.
We all end up in the same place… in a nursing home,
translation.ko: 결국 끝은 똑같아 요양원에 처박혀 있잖아

translation.en: falling asleep in front of crappy TV.
translation.ko: 허접한 TV 앞에서 꾸벅꾸벅 졸고 있지

translation.en: And the only memories we have are the ones that were, like, really fun.
You know, the times we spent with our friends,
not the schoolwork or the textbooks.
translation.ko: 학교 숙제나 공부 같은 거 말고

translation.en: I talk too much.
I felt it! The thing you were talking about,
translation.ko: 이제 알았어 네가 그때 얘기했던 거

translation.en: about getting out of my head and dancing.
translation.ko: 생각 안 하고 춤추는 거 있잖아

translation.en: I literally was, like, stamping books, and it just started happening,
translation.ko: 책에 도장 찍다가 갑자기 그렇게 된 거야

translation.en: and I got out of my head, and I can dance.
Quinn, whoa, slow down.
And I'm so sorry. I'm so sorry if I hurt you.
translation.ko: 진짜 미안해 나 때문에 상처받았다면 완전 미안

translation.en: -It's okay. -No, it's not, 'cause I…
I thought that dancing would get me into Duke,
translation.ko: 춤을 추면 듀크대에 갈 수 있고

translation.en: and Duke was gonna make me happy.
But dancing makes me really happy.
And so do you.
What are the odds of... getting the TBDs back together?
translation.ko: '나정예' 재결성할 확률이 얼마나 될 것 같아?

translation.en: I'm gonna have to see you dance first.
-Yeah. Ready? Start with a little… -Yeah. Go for it.
-Okay, all right. -Just a little… -and then… -Just a little…
You got a little swimming something happening here.
translation.ko: 수영 좀 하는 모양새인데 느낌 있네 완전 괜찮은데

translation.en: That's actually really nice.
[Quinn whispering] All right. Come on, guys. Come on in.
[speaking normally] Welcome to your new rehearsal space.
I can feel Harold's ghost in here.
What about all the old people?
Everyone here is usually in bed by 7:00,
so as long as we keep the noise down and don't disturb any of the residents,
translation.ko: 소리 낮추고 입주민들 거슬리지 않게 하면

translation.en: we can rehearse here in the evenings.
-Seriously? -Yeah.
[Quinn] And guys, I know I said I was quitting, but I--
Nobody believed that.
Yeah. After I heard you crying in the bathroom last week,
translation.ko: 지난주에 네가 화장실에서 펑펑 우는 소리 듣고

translation.en: I texted Priya to start stretching again.
-That's right. She did. -Oh, mm… That's funny. I wasn't crying.
translation.ko: 맞아, 그랬어 그거 신기하네, 난 안 울었는데

translation.en: [whispers] It kinda sounded like you.
You know what? Doesn't matter. Doesn't matter.
Let's get started.
Okay, uh, here's the plan.
In the next few weeks,
you're all gonna be learning each other's styles, all right?
-Five, six, seven, eight. -["Satisfied" by Galantis playing]
Turn that shit up!
Hey.
Quinn, I am on the toilet!
I know, but this is the only place I could talk to you alone.
translation.ko: 알아, 근데 여기 아니면 둘이 얘기하기 힘들어서

translation.en: Listen, I've made a lot of mistakes over the past few months.
translation.ko: 지난 몇 달 동안 내가 실수한 게 좀 많지

translation.en: Can we please talk about this later?
But the mistake I regret most of all is hurting you.
translation.ko: 그중에서도 가장 후회하는 건 너한테 상처 준 거야

translation.en: -I'm drowning you out with my pee. -[urinating]
translation.ko: 쉬 때문에 네 얘기 하나도 안 들려

translation.en: Okay, I'm done.
-Look, I'm really sorry-- -[hand dryer whooshes]
-I said I'm so-- -[hand dryer whooshes]
Okay, I'm sorry. Ew, how are your hands still wet?
translation.ko: 미안해, 어떻게 아직도 손이 젖어 있어?

translation.en: -God, I miss paper towels. -Okay, listen,
translation.ko: 종이 수건이 그립네 들어 봐, '나정예' 재결성했어 제이크도 돌아왔고

translation.en: the TBDs are in, Jake is in,
and we're still training for the competition.
Look, I understand if you don't wanna come back, 'cause…
after the way I acted, I don't blame you.
translation.ko: 내가 그따위로 굴었으니 할 말이 없지

translation.en: But I just want you to know that you deserve to dance
with a group of people that actually care about you.
translation.ko: 넌 네 능력을 알아주는 사람들과 춤춰야 한다는 거

translation.en: I'm gonna use the bathroom. I've had to pee this whole time.
translation.ko: 나도 쉬 좀 싸고 올게 지금까지 계속 참았거든

translation.en: [Juilliard] I do not know what to say. Absolutely everything you did was a fail.
translation.ko: 뭐라 할 말이 없다 지금까지 네가 맡은 모든 부분이 다 폭망이었어

translation.en: Trinity, your levels, they were all over the place.
translation.ko: 트리니티, 너 정도 되는 애는 널리고 널렸어

translation.en: What was with that thing you did after the third count?
translation.ko: 셋 센 후에 했던 건 뭐야?

translation.en: I thought I'd put a little extra stank on it.
Oh… Well, if you could please refrain from stanking up the place,
translation.ko: 무대 위에서는 같잖은 기교 좀 넣어두면

translation.en: that would be lovely.
Well, I thought it looked dope.
Well, thankfully you're not the captain of this team.
translation.ko: 네가 이 팀 주장이 아니라 다행이네

translation.en: Everyone, you can go. And practice, please.
translation.ko: 다들 해산, 가서 연습 좀 해

translation.en: Work on yourselves.
Jas, stay.
Thank you. I like 'em too.
I took you back because you're good.
But we do have corporate sponsorships to uphold.
translation.ko: 그래도 협찬받는 거 말고 다른 신발 신으면 안 되지

translation.en: It's just a rehearsal.
Well, birds of a feather flock together.
Yeah.
You can go.
Thank you, sir.
Okay, then. Seems like we have costumes figured out.
translation.ko: 좋아, 이제 의상 문제는 끝난 거 같으니

translation.en: Now we just need to figure out this name thing.
-I kinda like TBDs. -Yeah, it's grown on me.
What does it stand for again?
To be determined...
which I think really describes us.
translation.ko: 우리 상태를 잘 표현한 것 같아

translation.en: -[Robby] You quit the Birds? -[Raven] Wait. So you're rejoining?
You think I was gonna let you guys win Work It without me? Yeah, I'm back.
translation.ko: 나 없이 대회 나가게 내버려 둘 줄 알았어? 돌아왔지

translation.en: [all chanting] TBD! TBD!
-TBD! -[Jas yells] You say what?
Beyoncé…
Queen Bey…
I pray that you make my feet swift tomorrow.
translation.ko: 내일 내 발이 날아다닐 수 있게 해주소서

translation.en: May my flow be precise and may my moves have swagger.
translation.ko: 정확하고 절도 있는 움직임으로 리듬을 타게 해주소서

translation.en: In the name of the "Single Ladies" video,
the Lemonade short film, and the Netflix special Homecoming…
I pray.
[Quinn] The next morning I could feel Queen Bey's light shining down on me.
translation.ko: 다음 날 아침 퀸 베이의 기운이 따사롭게 내리쬐는 게 느껴졌다

translation.en: I didn't know if I would completely humiliate myself onstage,
translation.ko: 무대를 완전 말아먹고 망신당할 수도 있지만

translation.en: but for the first time, I didn't care.
translation.ko: 그런 게 신경 쓰이지 않았던 건 처음이었다

translation.en: I felt ready.
[repeating] No. No. We need to talk.
I can't talk right now. I have to go to study group.
translation.ko: 지금은 안 돼요 스터디하러 가야 해요

translation.en: I found this.
-What's that? -Are you kidding me?
I also found this.
Who is… "A-Dollar-Sign-A-P Rocky"?
That's not how you say it--
I'll pronounce it how I wanna pronounce it, thank you.
translation.ko: 내가 원하는 대로 부를 거야 고마워 죽겠네

translation.en: What are you wearing?
These are clothes. I'm going to st-- Library.
Oh, since when do you dress like Shakira when you go to the library?
translation.ko: 언제부터 도서관 갈 때 샤키라처럼 옷 입었다고?

translation.en: Am I an idiot to you? 'Cause I know you're dancing.
translation.ko: 내가 모지리 같니? 너 춤추는 거 다 알거든

translation.en: -I know you're doing it behind my back. -I understand you're mad.
translation.ko: 그것도 나 몰래 화난 거 이해해요

translation.en: You have every right to be, but I have to be somewhere in 30 minutes,
translation.ko: 충분히 그럴 수 있고요 근데 저 30분 안에 어디 가야 해서

translation.en: -so if you could just-- -Mad?
You know what? I am upset,
because we had a deal, and you're not going anywhere right now.
translation.ko: 네가 약속을 깼으니까 넌 아무 데도 못가

translation.en: You are grounded.
-♪ I'm gonna shove it ♪ -Where is she?
Quinn, you lied to me. You blew off your schoolwork.
translation.ko: 퀸, 나한테 거짓말했잖아 학교 숙제도 빼먹고

translation.en: And I don't care what kind of personal breakthrough
translation.ko: 지금 네가 무슨 생각으로 이러는진 몰라도

translation.en: you're having right now. You are not leaving this house.
translation.ko: 이 집에서 한 발자국도 못 나갈 줄 알아

translation.en: -Mom? -Yes?
-I'm leaving this house. -No, you're not!
Wh-- Quinn!
What the hell?
No! Whoa! What are you doing? You don't know how to drive a car.
translation.ko: 뭐 하는 거야? 운전할 줄도 모르면서

translation.en: I know. I'm sorry. I'm so sorry.
I'm really happy, so I think this has to be a good thing, right?
translation.ko: 근데 지금 너무 행복해요 이건 좋은 거 맞죠?

translation.en: Wrong. Nuh-uh. Get out of the car.
I can't. I have to go dance.
I am going to kill you.
-Okay, great! Bye! -[engine revs]
Get out of that car. You don't know how to drive. You're wrong!
translation.ko: 당장 내려, 운전도 못 하면서 그러면 안 된다니까

translation.en: [mom] Quinn!
It's a one-way street!
You're going the wrong way!
Oh, I gotta call an Uber.
[male announcer] Okay, everybody,
please welcome three-time returning champions
from Woodbright High, the Thunderbirds!
Holy shit!
It's like the Rapture.
Quinn, where are you?
[Quinn] I'm coming, everybody!
Okay, I can't text and drive. I can barely drive.
translation.ko: 보채기는, 운전하면서 문자 보낼 순 없잖아 운전도 힘들어 죽겠는데

translation.en: Oh no! Oh my God!
Pyrotechnics.
Nice touch.
[male announcer] Wow! What a performance from our returning champions.
translation.ko: 세상에, 돌아온 챔피언이 끝내주는 무대를 선보였습니다

translation.en: And now for the judges' scores…
9.0! Putting the Thunderbirds in the lead!
Up next, our final team: TBD.
Quinn's not here. What do we do?
Hey.
You ready?
[all chanting repeatedly] TBD!
Are you Jasmine Hale?
Yeah. Yeah, I am.
I'm with the New York Dance Academy.
I'd love to speak with you about joining our program in the fall.
translation.ko: 가을에 합류해 줄 수 있을지 얘기 좀 하고 싶은데요

translation.en: -I would love to speak with you. -Fantastic.
translation.ko: 그런 얘기라면 환영이죠 - 잘됐네요 - 평생 바라던 거거든요

translation.en: I've been waiting my entire life. [laughs]
-Quinn Ackerman. -Ms. Ramirez! You came.
Of course I came. You were so good.
You… You illuminated the shit out of this place.
Thank you very much.
-Yeah, you did. You did that, honey. -[Quinn] Thanks.
translation.ko: - 감사합니다 - 진짜로 진짜 잘했어, 내가 지금은 뉴욕 대학교로 옮겼거든

translation.en: I gotta tell you, I just got a new position at NYU.
translation.ko: 진짜 잘했어, 내가 지금은 뉴욕 대학교로 옮겼거든

translation.en: Here's my card. I think you might like it there.
translation.ko: 내 명함이야 너도 거기가 맘에 들 거야

translation.en: Call me.
[Ms. Ramirez] So good!
How does she keep getting jobs?
Are you Juilliard?
Juilliard? Uh… I don't know her.
My name is Isaiah.
Robby, keep her safe.
Big Apple, baby.
I knew you'd get in!
You did? Why didn't you tell me?
-[both laugh] -Looks like we'll be seeing a lot of each other next fall.
translation.ko: 다음 가을엔 많이 마주칠 것 같다

translation.en: [sarcastically] Yay.
Your performance today…
was actually not bad.
-Thank you. -Thank you.
I'm really happy for you guys.
I'm so bored of winning all the time, right?
Anyway, I just thought I'd come over here and say congrats.
I've changed.
Well…
that was interesting.
-Hm. -So whatcha up to now?
Mm… Well, Mama's getting a new mattress today.
Yeah!
-And it is extra spoon-worthy. -[Quinn giggles]
Hi.
I'm pretty sure that we illegally won,
since rule 85 in the Work It code of conduct
says you can't compete if you've already graduated.
translation.ko: 졸업생은 참가하면 안 된다고 명시돼 있거든

translation.en: Aw, look at that! Love is happening all around us, honey.
We just have to look for it.
Play me something, boo.
[Quinn] In the end, Einstein was right.
Dancers are the athletes of God.
And, as it turns out, I'm one of them,
translation.ko: 그리고 알고 보니 나도 그중 하나였다

translation.en: because it's actually not that hard to find a four-count
translation.ko: 4박자나 내 심장 박동 소리 찾아내는 게

translation.en: or the beat of your own heart.
All you have to do is listen to it.
That's all I've got figured out.
The rest is TBD.
